column4: Does anyone has a link where it is explained, why you shouldn't use sudo instead of gksudo with GUI applications?
Using sudo for GUI applications could cause minor problems like Firefox not keeping extentions, or serious problems such as not being able to log in anymore.
It could possibly change the permissions in the .ICEauthority file.
And since you asked for a link...http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=96661
